title: Cuban pork fillet in the slow cooker
ingredients: ['1 onion, sliced', '1.4kg pork fillet', '3 tablespoons finely chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon barbecue seasoning blend', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '120ml orange juice', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 lemon, juiced and zested', '3 bay leaves']
